give me money tick-and tell ur friends to do the same--i need 500,000 in unmarked bills in the dumpster behind my house by 6am tomarrow morning--and if i go sifting thru that pile of shit and i dont find my loot, ur fucking dead, every last one of you. ill hunt u down one by one, skin you alive and smear rock salt into every square inch of your bloody staggering carcasses... j/k! i luv u guys!!

nah that wasnt duck, gary. and please, if you need something(money, ideas, whatever) please dont hesitate to ask me. i will help you out in whatever way i can.. as for a place to stay, im sure that if you dont have a place to stay, my mom can rent out my room at her house for you. he has had many people stayin at her house before, and as long as your willing to help with th rent every month and not eat all their food, i dont doubt that she will let you live there. and i havent spent ONE SECOND in the realm of the cock so dont even fuck with me you ass-faced jew-banger! lol. im workin tonight and saturday morning, but after that, if you want to do something, give me a call. -§ÉLÉk7å-

You do know me silly pants!!! And as of getting married, #1 Although we have met, I am sorry to say that I don't know you that well... # 2 perhaps in the future, if you are not threatened by comments such as "mr wheat, marry my girlfriend and i will eat you." then we might be able to consider it. As of now, I think the answer is no. Sorry. Good news all, tomorrow is Friday, and then that means 3 days of no schools! :oD!! PEACE!

sorry bra, i was confused--good for u tho, hope that whole vagina thing works out for ya, with all of your experiences lying in the realm of cock. now was that duck trying to talk to me? honestly i dunno what the fuck hes squakin about. so life's ruff without the barn--just yesterday i put a 2D rpg in my ps2--lunar silver star story--fantastic game, but only tolerable in boredom. the thing is i have so much work to do--getting my car fixed,getting a place to live, packing all my shit, but i lack motivation. and its not like i have anyone to push me. ive always given off this image of self-sufficiency, so now when i want help i cant ask for it because it dissassembles everything ive worked for. i always thought myself to be one of foresight, and in a very shallow way i am--i often kno what to do in the morning if i want to achieve happiness later in the day but thats about as far ahead as i can look. o well, elixirs tonite and tomarrow evol intents playing at element so everythings cool.
dude. jenny is my girlfriend. and i can assure you, she HAS a vagina :P

mr wheat, marry my girlfriend and i will eat you. and yes jenny, your are my bitch:) sigh. i hate what the ny state educational system has to offer. i am busting my little white ass to get a 70 in math class. that sucks. and gee...dont mind dutko, he knows not what he says. i dont think he can handle such a merciless slew of insults that you issued me. §ÉLÉk7å!

...seriously, im desperate and lonely...stop laughing! im dying inside!...eh, forget it. what have i gotten myself into? as if having my own weblog, where i could seek pity from complete strangers with equally pathetic lives wasn't sad enough, here i am battling wits with the only person ive ever known to have taken a wet plunger to the face, warding off the inane babblings of a chappelle-posessed half-wit with the voice of a woodland fowl, and proposing marriage to a someone ive never met who may or may not have a vagina...if this were a glass of fruit-juice we would be the soaking pulp at the bottom, and i the fattest chunk.

whoopdi-shit. i passed my drivers test. i guess i dont hate the dmv as much as i though i did lol. anyways. i should be getting a car soon. that way other people dont need to cart my ass all over the place. i got a job too. yyup, thats right. im moving up in the world. i got a job at a restaurant just down the street from me. i make 5.25 an hour under the table with at least 25 in tips every time i work. i am a happy happy boy. and when gee got busted, a picture of me smoking a cigarette was on his dads camera. lol, i am anxiously awaiting a bitch-session the next time i venture into the depths of avon. oh well. -§ÉLÉk7å-

So my parents found out im not the godsend they once thought, but a raving, smoking drunk. So now im a stranger in my own house and i hate it. I need to get out quick. I need a real life. So much of my stress comes from my parents, but once im out so much of it will come from money--or my lack thereof. All i want rite now is to make some decent money and pursue my DJing and music production. But its hard to work on the extra things in life when all the important things are falling apart.
the blog is growing so nicely! sweetness. everyone update a lot and it will be tons of fun. oh, and towels are the only things seperating us from the yugoslavians. peace.

yeah, the site is gonna be awesome. a friend of mine(the php programmer) is now making a shout box. a shout box is a section of the site where there is a text bar to type in, you type..add it...and it pops up in the chat. it keeps on re-updating itself everytime you refresh. it is going to be very similar to the degolburg square in lotgd.net this should all be done by tomorrow or the day after. me and a friend have been slaving over the flash nav bar on the site. it looks fuckin sweet. and gary, the ideas(as far as the comic itself goes)remain the same.except i liked your idea of making it a community comic. there is still the process of creating characters and a story-line. if you have any ideas, i leave this partly up to you. i would like to keep tick and gee though. things are looking pretty good for the comic this time. i now have people involved who know what the hell they are doing. and better news...my friend murph(the php dude) is letting me house his server at my place. so not only will we have a kick-ass site...it will be on our own server with our own band-width. no more of that angelfire shit. good times. -§elekta-
Thanks Gary, I appreciate your sympathy. =)

id like to get back into it--but ill need some time to come up with something--post some ideas for me to work with and ill see what i can do--now that im not in school i should be able to find sometime for something like that--jes lemme no where u wanna go with it, alrite?

ah yes. i can see that this blog has grown substantially. i want to thank everyone for posting so frequently. that aside. most of you know that i had a pitiful excuse for a webcomic up and running a little while ago. well...its down, and a new comic is in the making. foolish? yes. but this time,i have help. plus i know someone who is fluent in php prgramming. so, there will be a forum on the site not so different from blogger. members will be able to update posts and profiles, and comment on that days comic. i have gained more knowledge on how to build web-sites, and how to plan a biweekly comic. if anyone would like to help, please email me. the new site url is www.angelfire.com/ill/selekta it will be moved to a domain once the page templates are finished. gary, if you are still interested in drawing or writing for this comic, please, for the love of god, step forward and offer your mad skills to me. arigato.
